title: Across the Desperate Miles
description: Rand and Kera, husband and wife, ordinary people caught up in extraordinary circumstances. A cross-country rescue mission in a Ferrari turns into a survival expedition on foot and horseback. As their country falls into anarchy these estranged parents must learn a new way of thinking and living, fight back against hate and brutality, and use every skill born into them to last and save their children.This current day, edge-of-your-seat story has themes of personal transformation and redemption, relationship, love, journey, landscape and nature, revolution, survival, and simpler living.132,430 words; 340 6x9 pages in print.
author: Patrick Michael Murphy
